title: Basic training and conditioning: weight training. No. 1
creator_credit: Dr Frank Ryan and Ryan Films
brief_description: Expresses the opinion that much of the athletic achievement in recent years has been due to weight training and indicates the events associated with weight training or weight lifting. The part played by the various muscles in these events are pointed out, and the training program for developing these muscles illustrated and described.
